text: "Easy" is a song by Dominican-American singer DaniLeigh. It was later remixed with vocals from American R&B; singer Chris Brown, and it was released on May 31, 2019 under Def Jam Recordings as a single.https://www.rap- up.com/2019/06/11/video-danileigh-chris-brown-easy-remix/ ==Compositon== "Easy" is an R&B; slow-jam produced by Fallon King and Christopher Allen Clark, where the singers perform a mutual serenade dedicated to the intimate moments of two people in love.https://genius.com/Danileigh-easy-remix-lyrics ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Australia (ARIA) | 84 |- ! scope="row"| France (SNEP) | 25 |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Hot Singles (RMNZ)https://nztop40.co.nz/chart/hotsingles?chart=4654 | 11 |- |- |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2019 singles Category:2019 songs Category:Chris Brown songs Category:Songs written by Chris Brown
title: Easy (DaniLeigh song)
